name: groupdocs/groupdocs-assembly
description: The GroupDocs.Assembly for Cloud SilverStripe plugin lets you collect data to automatically create new documents online by embedding GroupDocs.Assembly questionnaires. GroupDocs.Assembly is an online document automation and document assembly app. Document assembly is the process of collecting information and creating new documents. It is often used for letters, contracts and quotes: document where most of the information remains the same, but some details - name, address, date, start date or income, for example - varies from person to person.
